alert.note: Alert for Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 8:50AM EDT until August 18 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bristol County in southeastern Massachusetts... Washington County in Rhode Island... Newport County in Rhode Island... Southeastern Kent County in Rhode Island... Southeastern Providence County in Rhode Island... Bristol County in Rhode Island... * Until 945 AM EDT. * At 850 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from West Warwick to Exeter to near Westerly, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fall River, Warwick, Taunton, East Providence, Coventry, South Kingstown, West Warwick, North Kingstown, Newport, Bristol, Westerly, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Middletown, Narragansett, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, and Seekonk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
